column5: Only 6 bites this morning but all bass over 4 lbs, largest about 5.40lbs. Had only til 11am to fish. New area found today cabbage weedlines with Lucky Craft Pointer 128.  View Hawg Video   Here is a pic of the big girl.  My wife  and best fishing partner in the world Janice pounded on the Northern Pike with Spinnerbaits  Gotta love the big dumb city bass.  I have a client to guide tomorrow so I hope they are hungry again.  tightlines & cross their eyes...  Mark T.
nice fish and good luck tommorow
Nice buildings.  Would have likedl to see the full size of the last bass it looks huge but got sut off.   dsn
Nice buckets !!!!!!!!!!!!  great catch,and nice pics too,not used to seeing apt buildings in the background where there are bass to be caught...cheers & good luck tommorow
Hello Ranger  Can anyone just bring their boat and fish at the back of the harbour?  What are the restricted areas, or do we need a license to go there?  Thanks for your input
You need a liscense for sure.  link
gotta love those downtown bass and pike!
Nice city slimers and downtown Bass  MTP
Wow, I knew there were plenty of pike down there but am surprised by the bass. Nicely done!
Wow...great report and pics!  It's good to know that the fishing is great down in the city...for those times you just cant get up north.  Awesome stuff!
